item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 20, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:

28. Drift towards danger and the normalization of deviance (2017) (163 points | 83 comments)
29. Biggest ever seen black hole jets; blasting plasma well beyond their own galaxy (84 points | 36 comments)
